Package client.view

Class Summary
BatterySensorPanel File: BatterySensorPanel.java Authors: Sean Jagat and Nick Knowlson Assignment: 4 Class: CPS235 Instructor: Frank Niscak Due Date: November 23, 2007 Purpose: The BatterySensorPanel class is the panel that the Battery Sensor is drawn on
